title.narrative: Prepare for processing plant by taking manageable steps

description.narrative:
In order to pursue the ambition to start up an own processing plant for pasteurising milk, Kiambaa conducted a feasibility study and subsequently, a business plan was elaborated.
During the AGM of 30 October 2013, members agreed to continue the project of the processing plant and approved the resolution to increase packing shares with an additional 250 KES a month as from November 2013. This contribution together with other funds from Society operations shall be utilised to pay the plant loan.
There was a delay in establishing processing plant because of lengthly procurement of 2 acres plot for the new processing plant. Business plan was further adjusted and even scaled down to manageable scale. Average milk intake increased again, from an average of 13,986 l/d in 2013 to an average of 16,109 l/d in 2014 (+15%).
Activities as elaborated jointly by Agriterra and Kiambaa for 2015:
Intensify Extension services to farmers Plan, hire and train Extension staff: done with support of SNV Prepare for processing plant by taking manageable steps every year Hire project manager (future production manager?) on starting up pasteurising and packaging and preparing plan for building new factory
Performance management - Training of Staff on a) customer care b) new organisation with new working methods and new ICT - Select ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system for the new plant, implement last new modules on the existing ICT system
- Contract marketing agency to a) search and select 3 milk shop locations, b) plan marketing, c) plan branding shops, d) plan PR (incl. newsletters, website) - Evaluate operation new equipment + prepare next step: design and plan new processing plant on new location (April)
Targets:
Increase milk intake to meet targets in business plan Increased area planted with fodder crops and use of silage by progressive farmers Boost milk collection to 18,000 litres a day Install and start up 1 June 2015 of milk pasteurisation and yoghurt production on enlarged existing location Modernise ICT to remain in control when processing starts Develop marketing & sales plan with marketing agency
Prepare for processing plant by taking manageable steps
